channel.title: How to give my monsters hitpoints
channel.description:
I am getting ever so bored of moparscape and I was wondering if there was a way of giving my monsters hitpoints
Like i have a KBD and i hit it for 0 and it dies
Please Help!

item.title: How to give my monsters hitpoints
item.dc:creator: @gaara123 gaara123
item.description:
@gaara123 wrote:

what is the compile thing u said
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2007, 09:29:40 AM[/size][hr]What are the coordinates for the level 5 wildy area

Read full topic
item.source: How to give my monsters hitpoints

item.title: How to give my monsters hitpoints
item.dc:creator: @bludwow0 bludwow0
item.description:
@bludwow0 wrote:

lol… your doing it wrong… did u type like say um… ::npc (KBD ID?) lol… that is when u hit it once and it dies… yes… if u go into autospawn.cfg and scroll to the bottom… and where it says

[ENDOFSPAWNLIST] make a new line above that and it shud look something like this…

spawn = 2745 2375 5068 0 3104 5068 3104 5068 1 Jad

you mAKE a new line like that…
if it was KBD u wanted u would put somet like this
spawn = 50 (coorX where u want) (coordY where u want) and just plot down your information…

once your done with that… save… compile… runserver… and your done

-Hope this helps you-

Read full topic
